snippet.title: LIVE: NRL teams round 22
snippet.content: WELCOME to our live coverage of the round 22 NRL team announcements. Scroll down to join our live blog with Tom Sangster. Here are our SuperCoach predictions: WINNERS Sam Burgess - Expected to be named despite aggravating a rib injury on the weekend. Cameron Munster - Suffered an ankle injury on the weekend but expected to be named for the Storm, although he is in serious doubt. Nathan Brown - Has been cleared of concussion by Parramatta officials and is a certain starter. Billy Slater - Returns from concussion for the Storm. Jordan Rapana - Returns from suspension for the Raiders. LOSERS Andrew McCullough - Out for the season with ACL and MCL injuries. Shaun Lane - Expected to be named on the bench for the Sea Eagles, as per last week's late change. Originally published as
